author: husted
msg: Add ActionServletWrapper and modify ActionForm to address issue #4997 - autopopulation exploit.
This change prevents the Public String properties of ActionServlet from being changed via a query string.

author: husted
msg: Update release notes for 1.0.1 and the nightly build.

msg: - fix #3828, equals() method problem (ported from main branch)
- fix #4427, lost bytes on read(byte[],int,int) (need to port to main branch)
- fix #4701, premature end of input stream not reported (need to port to main branch)
